str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To free, set free, liberate. From eleutheros; to liberate, i.e. to exempt.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Corruption, destruction, decay, rottenness, decomposition. From phtheiro; decay, i.e. Ruin.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
Freedom, liberty, especially: a state of freedom from slavery. From eleutheros; freedom.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
